verbs.description: [V: Speaking] [ARG2: to a crowd of military spouses] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] falsely claimed that his administration gave servicemembers their first pay raise in 10 years , a moment he was “ proud ” to oversee . He lied .
